components.name: Frontend Web Application
components.description: The user interface, responsible for presenting information and accepting user input. Built using React.

components.name: Backend API Server
components.description: Handles user requests, processes data, and interacts with the database. Implemented using Node.js and Express.

components.name: Relational Database
components.description: Stores application data. Utilizes PostgreSQL for data persistence.

data_flows.description: User interactions (e.g., login, data submission) are transmitted to the backend API server via HTTPS.
The API server queries and updates the database to store and retrieve application data.
The API server retrieves data from the database to fulfill user requests.

trust_boundaries.name: User Authentication Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Defines the boundary between untrusted user input and authenticated user data.

trust_boundaries.name: Database Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Controls access to the relational database, limiting access to authorized components only.
